alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 12 at 10:42AM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN AND CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA AND A FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... .Critical fire weather conditions are expected across western and central North Dakota this afternoon through early this evening. Northwest winds sustained to 35 mph with peak gusts as high as 55 mph are expected, with minimum relative humidity dropping as low as 25 percent. Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and be difficult to control or suppress. Critical fire weather conditions are possible again on Thursday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR CENTRAL NORTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * WINDS...Northwest to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * AFFECTED AREA...Central North Dakota. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite will spread rapidly and become difficult to control or suppress.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Pierce; Rolette; Stutsman; Wells
